name: Momotarou Dentetsu 2017 - Tachiagare Nippon!! [3DS]
description: Momotarō Dentetsu 12: Nishinihon Hen mo ari Masse! (桃太郎電鉄12～西日本編もありまっせー！) is a video game in the Momotaro Dentetsu series of board game-style video games, genre released in 2003 by Hudson Soft for the PlayStation 2 and Nintendo GameCube. The game was only released in Japan.
